author: kacboy
title: It's Not Bad
review:
It's a pretty nice helmet but it was kinda tight on my head.
More for about 4-7 year olds. I don't know where it is any more.
I think I through it away. I'm pretty sure you can only get it at official LEGO stores.

Price: About $15
Fun: 3/5. 4.5/5 if you have a good knight costume.
